title: Chief Diversity Officers Report Stress Amid Shifting Roles
description: Chief diversity officers find their work has gotten harder and more stressful over the past two years, according to a new national survey by the National Association of Diversity Officers in Higher Education. The survey results, published Tuesday, are based o…
